ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Antionah was the judge in Ammonihah until you were able to beat him. Now he has fled.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Antionah belonged to the Order of the Nehors and abused his power in this city to punish those who didn't join the religion.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: We will have to hold a special election to choose a new judge in Ammonihah. I hope we establish leadership quickly here. It will be hard to defend against the Lamanites without it. But I fear the remaining residents who belong to the Order of the Nehors will cause strife and delay elections and the establishment of our defenses.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: I don't know what my co-worker is talking about. Ammonihah is strong, and there's no way the Lamanites could attack us. Have you seen our wall to the south? Nobody is getting past that!
